    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExchangeAccount

        public ExchangeAccount(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                       java.lang.String easUser,
                       java.lang.String easDomain,
                       java.lang.String serverAddress,
                       java.lang.String serverPassword)
        API to generate a new exchange account with base parameters.
        参数:
        emailAddress - The email address corresponding to the account, should not be null
        easUser - The user of the account
        easDomain - Account domain
        serverAddress - The server address corresponding to this account, should not be null
        serverPassword - The server password corresponding to this account
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed

      • ExchangeAccount

        public ExchangeAccount(java.lang.String displayName,
                       java.lang.String emailAddress,
                       java.lang.String easUser,
                       java.lang.String easDomain,
                       int syncLookback,
                       int syncInterval,
                       boolean isDefault,
                       java.lang.String senderName,
                       java.lang.String protocolVersion,
                       java.lang.String signature,
                       java.lang.String serverAddress,
                       boolean useSSL,
                       boolean useTLS,
                       boolean acceptAllCertificates,
                       java.lang.String serverPassword,
                       java.lang.String serverPathPrefix,
                       int calendarPeriod,
                       boolean displayHtmlDisabled,
                       boolean forwardEmailDisabled,
                       boolean screenShotDisabled)
        API to generate a new exchange account.
        参数:
        displayName - The display name of the account
        emailAddress - The email address corresponding to the account, should not be null
        easUser - The user of the account
        easDomain - Account domain
        syncLookback - Number of previous days to sync email Value 1 - 1 day Value 2 - 3 days Value 3 - 1 week Value 4 - 2 weeks Value 5 - 1 month Value 6 - all
        syncInterval - Frequency to sync email during peak time Value -2 - Automatic push Value -1 - Never Value 15 - 15 minutes Value 30 - 30 minutes Value 60 - 1 hour
        isDefault - True to make this account the default
        senderName - User name for outgoing messages
        protocolVersion - Protocol version of Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync (EAS only)
        signature - Signature to use with the account
        serverAddress - The server address corresponding to this account, should not be null
        useSSL - True to enable the email account setting for Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
        useTLS - True to enable the email account setting for Transport Layer Security (TLS)
        acceptAllCertificates - True to accept all certificates sent by the server
        serverPassword - The server password corresponding to this account
        serverPathPrefix - The server path Prefix corresponding to this account
        calendarPeriod - Number of previous days Calendar to sync Value 1 - 2 weeks Value 2 - 1 month Value 3 - 3 months Value 4 - 6 months Value 5 - All
        displayHtmlDisabled - True to disable HTML format for emails
        forwardEmailDisabled - True to prevent the user to forward email to other accounts
        screenShotDisabled - True to prevent the user to capture screen
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed

      • ExchangeAccount

        public ExchangeAccount(java.lang.String displayName,
                       java.lang.String emailAddress,
                       java.lang.String easUser,
                       java.lang.String easDomain,
                       int syncLookback,
                       int syncInterval,
                       boolean isDefault,
                       java.lang.String senderName,
                       java.lang.String protocolVersion,
                       java.lang.String signature,
                       java.lang.String serverAddress,
                       boolean useSSL,
                       boolean useTLS,
                       boolean acceptAllCertificates,
                       java.lang.String serverPassword,
                       java.lang.String serverPathPrefix,
                       int calendarPeriod,
                       boolean displayHtmlDisabled,
                       boolean forwardEmailDisabled,
                       boolean screenShotDisabled,
                       int syncCalendar,
                       int syncContacts)
        API to generate a new exchange account.
        参数:
        displayName - The display name of the account
        emailAddress - The email address corresponding to the account, should not be null
        easUser - The user of the account
        easDomain - Account domain
        syncLookback - Number of previous days to sync email Value 1 - 1 day Value 2 - 3 days Value 3 - 1 week Value 4 - 2 weeks Value 5 - 1 month Value 6 - all
        syncInterval - Frequency to sync email during peak time Value -2 - Automatic push Value -1 - Never Value 15 - 15 minutes Value 30 - 30 minutes Value 60 - 1 hour
        isDefault - True to make this account the default
        senderName - User name for outgoing messages
        protocolVersion - Protocol version of Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync (EAS only)
        signature - Signature to use with the account
        serverAddress - The server address corresponding to this account, should not be null
        useSSL - True to enable the email account setting for Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)
        useTLS - True to enable the email account setting for Transport Layer Security (TLS)
        acceptAllCertificates - True to accept all certificates sent by the server
        serverPassword - The server password corresponding to this account
        serverPathPrefix - The server path Prefix corresponding to this account
        calendarPeriod - Number of previous days Calendar to sync Value 1 - 2 weeks Value 2 - 1 month Value 3 - 3 months Value 4 - 6 months Value 5 - All
        displayHtmlDisabled - True to disable HTML format for emails
        forwardEmailDisabled - True to prevent the user to forward email to other accounts
        screenShotDisabled - True to prevent the user to capture screen
        syncCalendar - Sync calendar or not Value 0 - disable sync calendar, user can open or close. Value 1 - enable sync calendar, user can open or close. Value 2 - force sync calendar, user can't close.
        syncContacts - Sync contacts or not Value 0 - disable sync contacts, user can open or close. Value 1 - enable sync contacts, user can open or close. Value 2 - force sync contacts, user can't close.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the essential patrameter is missing or null, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed
